title: Close Out a Punch List Item
description: A contractor reports they have fixed a punch list item (e.g., a leaking valve). A commissioning engineer must verify the fix and close the item.

tasks.description: Find the specific punch list item in the commissioning system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the punch list item for the leaking valve.

tasks.description: Go to the field and visually inspect the valve to confirm it is no longer leaking.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer physically verifies that the repair was successful.

tasks.description: Change the status of the punch list item to 'Closed'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully closes the item, reducing the number of open items on the project.
